extendedInfo.description: The #1 mobile snowboard game in the world with more than 15 million players! NEW!! Now you can challenge your friends on the Heyzap leaderboards!- Works on your tablet and phone- Eye-popping 3D graphics- "WiFi Remote" control- 30 missions- 13 different riders to unlock- 13 boards to unlock- 16 touch-activated in-air tricks to unlock- Smashable obstacles: zombies, snowmen, elves!- Intuitive controls- In-air trick system- XPERIA PLAY optimized- Compatible with Moga Controllers- Challenge your friends on the Heyzap leaderboards!NEW: Use your phone as a game controller for your tablet using the new "WiFi Remote" feature!!

reviews.title: Controller
reviews.comment: I love this game because I can play it on my tablet as a gamescreen and phone as a controller. These ideas are what I\'m looking for. Please make more like this. Also love the tricks and grinds. Keep it up and please make more remote play games!
reviews.author: Kimberly Martinez

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: I played it for hours when I downloaded it. Awesome game with very nice visuals with easily getable characters and boards .Also it works very fine on my xperia mini.
reviews.author: Ravi Ranjan

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It was an amazing game and wonderful and enjoying game to spend time in playing with it
reviews.author: Ehab Nagy

reviews.title: Best snowboarding game
reviews.comment: Well I really enjoyed your game, but after 4days of playing I have completed all the mission!! So could you please add some more missions and  maybe a thousand if fine ;) cheers
reviews.author: Patrik Khalil

reviews.title: Best snowboard app ever
reviews.comment: I have yet to find a better snkwboarding game. However there needs to be at least twice if not 3 times more levals. You only get the bedt board , Rider and tricks in the last few levals. So why are there not entire upper upper levals. I would pay to play them after u beat the game whice i can now do w my eyes closed. I keep uninstalling and reinstalling this game becuase its the best one and its been that way for at least two years. OH YA WHERES THE HALF PIPE TOO.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BRILLIANT
reviews.comment: Really good, enjoyable game with controls that are simple and effective. Best free game ive downloaded. 5 stars.
reviews.author: Benjamin Lawrence

reviews.title: Pretty good...
reviews.comment: This is a good snowboarding game. The sequal should look more realistic and maybe have a multiplayer mode.
reviews.author: Ralph Davis

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.comment: Its fun to play and runs smoothly.  Tried a few other snowboarding games and they were either too complicated or poor controls.  This is far better than the others and uses less memory too.  Well done, and thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sluggish
reviews.comment: Major fricking LAAGGGGGG What a disappointment.  Was excellent and was 6 starz that\'s how good it was I gave it an additional 1 star more. Fix lag issue will go back to 6 starz  and an excellent review. My favorite game. I have no patients for lagging games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: the game is cool
reviews.comment: the game is really good, but the gameplay is boring and repeat every 3-5 level
reviews.author: S\303\241ndor Bokor

reviews.title: Mangla Media
reviews.comment: The only Snowboarding game I like on an Android device plus has great gameplay & controls. Has an added bonus that I\'ve not seen or used before called \"WiFi Remote\" where you can control you game with your mobile phone while displaying it on your Tablet or even better hook up your tablet to your TV & it\'s like an actual console game.
reviews.author: Richard Mordew

reviews.title: Watch the popup ads
reviews.comment: 1st  pop up ad was \"chat with sexy girls now\" link.  Guess if this is the type of ads they use for the free version I\'ll uninstall off my sons tablet.
reviews.author: Quinn Serpa

reviews.title: Alcatel one touch glory 2s
reviews.comment: Start installing when I see positive comments from the player.... cant wait to play the game!!!!
reviews.author: Yassin Azman

reviews.title: Good but a few things
reviews.comment: Good but i have a few things that i think would be good to have   1.make smoother grind rails 2.make it so you have to jump onto rails rarther than just apeering onit when close just put collision detecters just above the grind rail 3.i can make 3d trees to replace the lame billboard trees
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Issues....
reviews.comment: The game will lock my phone up during start up. I usually have to pull the phone battery to restart. Now the game has uninstalled itself during startup...
reviews.author: Thomas Guthrie

reviews.title: Pretty Nice
reviews.comment: So far I like to game, it seems to have really good graphs.
reviews.author: Tu Merchant

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Very fun game fun challenges just really good overall
reviews.author: nicholas crawford

reviews.title: A.W.S.O.M.E
reviews.comment: This game is ..... AWESOME everyone should love this game its fun.There\'s no abs coming up on the screen while ur playing and its a fun terrific game u should play.....!!!!!
reviews.author: Timaya Williams

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Hard to control him. Make it bettet and ill give 5 stars
reviews.author: Kara Monae

reviews.title: Maybe 3 1/2 stars...
reviews.comment: Its fun. Very responsive. Missions are really easy. I don\'t like how different boarders don\'t have different stats. Or how you can\'t spin and flip at the same time. Or how you can\'t do anything special with the grinds, like spin on the rail or jump on the rails, or do 5-0 grinds, basically all the cool $h!+ you see pros doing in videos. It needs some work, but it was fun at first, cause I didn\'t expect to see an app with those kind of graphics. I guess technology needs more credit than I previously gave it.
reviews.author: Bee Mcneil
